chapters.title: Chapter 26: Sallie Daera
chapters.info: Kiruna Nachiman, p. 452 (321)—Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah. She is an elegant, statuesque woman. She is a sister to the King of Arafel. She has four Warders, who she accompanied, along with Bera and her three Warders, to establish diplomatic relations with Rand in the Aiel Waste.
